about_the_game:
Qyllscape (verb): The act of an author becoming a traveler in another world.

All writing applications are designed to help writers progress towards their writing goals. Qyllscape supports writing efforts not by reinventing common functionality, but by offering a unique approach to a customizable, responsive writing environment that looks like a book.



Qyllscape lets you design your writing environment.


Change every setting to fit your preference.
  • All the fundamentals (page layout, font styles, etc.)
  • Colors for each aspect of the editor
  • Page titles and numbering
  • Single page and minimalist mode




Writing is a beautiful process.


Qyllscape was designed to be aesthetic, and is equipped with a unique candlelight tool that lets you match your external lighting environment. Helpful when you need to soften the editor for long writing sessions, or when you want to add a unique flair to your writing vlogs.

Don't worry. You can do this.


Here are a few other things that are included in the current version of Qyllscape.

  • Cloud saving between devices through Steam Cloud
  • Simple, experimental sound tools (Mechanical keyboard sound, fountain pen, ...)
  • Local backup system, including HTML creation for PDF/printing

Qyllscape is never finished, only abandoned. Development is still active.


The initial release of Qyllscape is intended to include all core features necessary to make progress on your writing project. With future updates, Qyllscape will be expanded on to offer even more customization and tooling.

These are some features that are currently being experimented with:

  • Rich text (Currently Qyllscape is plain-text only)
  • Book border options/variety
  • Decorative environment stickers
  • Larger library of sound options
  • Allow users to upload resources and share with others (Background textures, environment stickers, etc.)
  • Improved project exporting

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OXS Catalina (10.15)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

name: Qyllscape

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Qyllscape is a minimalist writing application designed not to make writing easier, but to make it easier to sit down and write.
